publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-5965 Mr George Cairney, Clydebank Citizen of the Year (lodged on 16 March 2010) Sarah Boyack*

S3M-5965 Des McNulty: Mr George Cairney, Clydebank Citizen of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates George Cairney, this year’s Clydebank Citizen of the Year; acknowledges, in particular, his pioneering efforts during the late 1980’s and early 1990’s to drive through a massive housing improvement project that ensured that Clydebank’s council houses had central heating and adequate roofing, and praises his outstanding contribution to his community through his work as Labour Councillor for Duntocher, Provost of Clydebank and lifelong community activist. Supported by: Sarah Boyack
S3M-5965 Mr George Cairney, Clydebank Citizen of the Year (lodged on 16 March 2010) David Stewart*
